Alecto:::

BlackFortress's defences turned off and a bot left the shi. Afte=
r that BlackFortress's defences turned up again. Alecto had decided to leav=
e to recive the newcomer.

"So..." said witha evil tone "Do you want join u=
s?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 4:28 PM
  Subject: Re: Slaye=
r


  ::Slayer::

  A fairly large bot lands outside the perimiter of Preda=
con area. He was tall, with a gun mounted on each of his forearms, and had =
fur growing out of his armor. He begins to walk toward the Predacon base.

=
  The bot was Slayer, but was completely uncomparable to him. His appearanc=
e, and his spark signature, were completely different. He had switched his =
comm off from a Trainer frequency so that he wouldn't be disturbed on this =
mission.

  Slayer taps his comm, sending a message to the Predacon base. "=
Predacons, this is Striker," he'd chosen the first fake name to pop into hi=
s mind, "I am near your base and am looking to join you."

  He calmly proc=
eeds forward, taking one final check on all the various precautions that he=
 had put into himself.



  --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
  > ::=
Slayer::
  > 
  > Slayer emerges out of the equipment room, a totaly differ=
ent bot. He had redesigned his look and spark signature, now appearing to b=
e a complete Predacon. He walks to the exit and flies out, sending a messag=
e to Ignatius.
  > 
  > "I will be back, with Prebon," the message reads as=
 he flies off toward the Predacon base.
